description: Manage encryption for an Azure Media Services account.

commands.name: az ams account encryption set
commands.summary: Set the encryption settings for an Azure Media Services account.
commands.syntax:
az ams account encryption set --key-type
                              [--account-name]
                              [--current-key-id]
                              [--ids]
                              [--key-identifier]
                              [--resource-group]
                              [--subscription]
                              [--system-assigned {false, true}]
                              [--user-assigned]
examples: az ams account encryption set -a myAmsAccount -g myRG --key-type CustomerKey --key-identifier keyVaultId
az ams account encryption set -a myAmsAccount -g myRG --key-type SystemKey

commands.name: az ams account encryption show
commands.summary: Show the details of encryption settings for an Azure Media Services account.
examples: az ams account encryption show --account-name myAmsAccount -g myRG
